memory_verse.label: Today's Bread
memory_verse.text: “He gave them power and authority over all demons, and to cure diseases. He sent them to preach the kingdom of God and to heal the sick.” (Luke 9:1–2)

devotion.label: Devotion
devotion.text:
The Lord has given you authority and power to heal diseases. Jesus clearly said, “They will lay hands on the sick, and they will recover.” (Mark 16:18)

Let us look at eight ways in which the Lord heals:

Dear children of God, the Lord wants to give you His healing power and authority. Receive it with faith. Lay hands in Jesus’ name and believe for healing miracles.

conclusion.label: Verse for further meditation
text: Verse for further meditation: “He who believes in Me, the works that I do he will do also; and greater works than these he will do.” (John 14:12)
